author: Nicolas Niarchos
title: A Drug Developed to Fight Ebola Could Hold Hope for Coronavirus Treatment
description: Last year, when I visited the town of Beni, in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), people did not shake hands. Bottles of disinfectant and buckets of chlorinated water were at the entrance of every business. Misinformation spread across social network…
